trends: There has been one other sighting in Bumpass
There were no other sightings in Bumpass on or around May 19th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the night sky on a clear night, with visible stars, saw a red orb, thought it was a helicopter. But it had no flashing lights, then it moved. Then it disappeared, then reappeared in a different location. It was about the altitude of a helicopter, no sound.
Summary: Bright red light. At first thought it was a helicopter but it had no flashing lights and did not move. Then disappeared, then came back and moved.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
